rooms.description: Open area serving as the entrance and transition space. Vastu-compliant north-east positioning for positivity.
Expansive living room with floor-to-ceiling windows facing south-west to invite natural light while ensuring privacy, following Vastu alignment.
Modular kitchen situated in the north-west quadrant, featuring robust concrete finishes and ample ventilation.
Adjacent dining space integrated with the living room for social gatherings, positioned to enhance flow and balance.
Service area adjoining kitchen for storage and maintenance work; Vastu guidelines ensure minimal interference with main spaces.

openings.description: Reinforced concrete door with glass panel, positioned in the north-east to harness positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window with robust framing in south-west for optimal light and aesthetic appeal.
Ventilation opening above the kitchen area, ensuring smoke dispersion.
Opening connecting to central courtyard with privacy screen

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the north-west side, incorporating a balcony overlooking the courtyard. Vastu compliant placement enhances peace and well-being.
Secondary bedroom positioned in the east with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light while maintaining privacy.
En-suite bathroom attached to master bedroom, designed with water-resistant finishes and ample storage.
Compact guest room near central corridor offering comfortable space; positioned to maintain Vastu balance.
